'Broad Future Education' (BFE, simplified Chinese: åç¾åç¨) is a private tutorial
school in China and Canada.

The first branch was established in 2001 in Vancouver Canada known as Xinxiwang.
Its services ranged from ESL tutoring to TOEFL, from LPI to GMAT and GRE. In
2008, it was registered as Broad Educational Consulting and established its
first branch in Shanghai in 2009. As of March 5, 2011, the Vancouver branch
changed its name to Broad Future.

The organization was founded by Zhang Yibing, an authority in the field of SAT
and American elite college application. Mr. Zhang is the author of five (5) SAT
prep books that sold more than 30000 copies in the first 10 months since it made
its debut.  File:a5.jpg| File:s4095788.jpg| File:s4095775.jpg|
File:s4095764.jpg| File:s4095758.jpg| 

Starting in 2007, Broad Future terminated all of its services except SAT, AP and
private counselling.

Under Zhang's leadership, BFE's emphasis on quality and integrity has
transformed the organization into the premiere choice for educational consulting
among Vancouver's most discerning and well-informed parents and students.
